readme.name: README.md
readme.content: Creates a navigation bar with the list of items: price mode switcher, currency switcher, language switcher, Company name and Business Unit name, mini-cart, quick order link, shopping list, company account link, link to the customer profile, link to the shopping list, and login/logout link.

definitions.name: data
definitions.contract:
cartQuantity: cartQuantity is defined ? cartQuantity : app['cart.quantity'] | default,
    showUserMenu: not (hideUserMenu | default(false)),
    isInline: true,
    withSeparators: true,
